context_of_use: This use case allows users to edit and maintain their personal profile and account information within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: To ensure account details remain accurate.
description: Enable users to edit and maintain their personal profile and account information.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User must be logged into the system.
User must have valid account credentials.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully in the system.
assumptions: User has access to the profile update feature.
User understands how to navigate to the profile update section.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
The system shall ensure that updated information is saved correctly.
outstanding_issues: Clarification needed on which profile fields are editable.
main_flow: 1. User initiates a request to update profile information → System displays the profile update form.
2. User enters new profile information → System validates the input.
3. User submits the updated profile information → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts the user to correct the input.
information_for_steps: 2. New profile information provided by the user.
